lead_paragraph: Family members of Tamir Rice, who was carrying a pellet gun when he was fatally shot by a white police officer, gathered for a vigil to mark the anniversary of the fatal encounter.

headline.main: Cleveland Vigil Marks Killing of Tamir Rice in 2014
headline.print_headline: Cleveland Vigil Marks Killing Of Boy in 2014

snippet: Family members of Tamir Rice, who was carrying a pellet gun when he was fatally shot by a white police officer, gathered for a vigil to mark the anniversary of the fatal encounter.
